mapper.sql: id, formid, amount, remark, operator, opttime,warehouseid
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(r.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d') byday, MAX(w.name) warheousename, MAX(m.sku) sku, max(m.name) name, SUM(r.quantity) handle, '辅料打包' ftype, SUM(r.quantity)*SUM(c.amount) handlesub, MAX(c.num) num, MAX(c.sub) sub from t_erp_inventory_record r LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w ON w.id=r.warehouseid LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=r.materialid LEFT JOIN (SELECT materialid, COUNT(0) num ,SUM(amount) amount ,GROUP_CONCAT(m.sku,'*',a.amount) sub from t_erp_material_consumable a LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=a.submaterialid GROUP BY materialid) c ON c.materialid=m.id WHERE r.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND m.issfg IN (0,2) AND c.num>0 AND `status`='outbound' AND formtype='outstockform' AND r.opttime>=#{fromdate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND r.opttime<=#{enddate,jdbcType=CHAR} GROUP BY r.materialid,DATE_FORMAT(r.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d') UNION all SELECT DATE_FORMAT(f.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d') byday, max(w.name) warehousename, MAX(m.sku) sku, max(m.name) name, sum(f.amount_handle) handle, '组装' ftype, SUM(f.amount_handle)*SUM(e.amount) handlesub, MAX(e.num) num, MAX(e.sub) sub FROM t_erp_assembly_from_instock it left join t_erp_assembly_form f ON f.id=it.formid LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=f.mainmid LEFT JOIN t_erp_warehouse w ON w.id=f.warehouseid LEFT JOIN (SELECT mainmid,SUM(subnumber) amount,COUNT(0) num,GROUP_CONCAT(m.sku,'*',a.subnumber) sub FROM t_erp_assembly a LEFT JOIN t_erp_material m ON m.id=a.submid GROUP BY mainmid ) e ON e.mainmid=f.mainmid WHERE f.shopid=#{shopid,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.opttime>=#{fromdate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.opttime<=#{enddate,jdbcType=CHAR} AND f.ftype='ass' GROUP BY f.mainmid,DATE_FORMAT(f.opttime,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT max(r.opttime) asstime , sum(r.amount) assqty, sum(r.amount*e.subnumber) subqty, max(e.subnumber) subnumber, GROUP_CONCAT(r.shipmentid) shipmentids, group_concat(m.sku) mainsku , max(m.name) mainname, max(p.location) mainimage FROM t_erp_assembly_from_instock r LEFT JOIN t_erp_assembly_form_entry e ON e.formid=r.formid AND e.materialid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR} left join t_erp_assembly_form f on r.formid=f.id left join t_erp_material m on m.id=f.mainmid left join t_picture p on p.id=m.image WHERE r.formid= #{assformid,jdbcType=CHAR} and e.materialid=#{materialid,jdbcType=CHAR}
